A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Joke with Poe and Hux at the beginning was drawn out way way too long.  Princess Leia surviving space and then flying through it without any major implications was ridiculous.  Casino Planet (Canto Bight) scene just seemed unnecessary and confusing.   Rose stopping Finn from ramming the cannon was just bad.  To me this unfortunately ranks as one of the worst Star Wars episodes.i
